title: Impact of Srila Prabhupadaâ€™s Books | Sri Suvyakta Narasimha Dasa
speaker: HG Suvyakta Narasimha Dasa

segments.key_quote: All simply vanished into thin air.
segments.summary: The speaker describes the pursuit of material pleasures and how Prabhupada's books can lead to detachment from these desires.
